price: គឺអ្នកដែលកោតខ្លាចម្ចាស់ដ៏មហាសប្បុរស ដោយអាថ៌-កំបាំង និងនាំមកនូវដួងចិត្ដដែលសារភាពកំហុស។
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
